Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the powers and duties of the comptroller to correct certain administrative errors
Summary: Provides a corrective remedy for certain administrative errors, omissions or inaccuracies relating to membership and benefits under the retirement system.
LawCode: Add ยง11-a, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the powers and duties of the comptroller
